roleset.name: default

example.name: remember a nominal
example.text: In an invention that drives Verdi purists bananas, Violetta lies dying in bed during the prelude, rising deliriously when-1 then she remembers the great parties she used to throw *trace*-1 .
example.arg: the great parties she used to throw

example.name: remember a sentence
example.text: The executive recalls Mr. Corry whispering to him and others, ``*PRO* Remember, this was Dave's deal.''

example.name: with attribute
example.text: ``A lot of people are remembering a vote for representation as a vote against Fred Smith,'' says J.X. Gollich, a Tiger-turned-Federal pilot and union activist.
example.arg: as a vote against Fred Smith

roleset.note: Member of Vncls characterize-29.2-1-1, consider-29.9-1-1-1. Checked by Julia, 10/2010.

frameset.note: Frames file for 'remember' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.
